City Council
============

![City Council members sitting in a meeting](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=303)

### The City of Aberdeen operates under the mayor-council form of government, where policy and administration are separated. All legislative and policy-making powers are vested in the city council. The administrative authority, including veto power, is vested in the mayor.

[![Facebook Opens in new window](https://aberdeenwa.gov/Assets/Images/IconShareFacebook.png "Share on Facebook")](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3a%2f%2faberdeenwa.gov%2fAlertCenter.aspx%3fAID%3d99&t=Check%20out%20this%20alert%20for%20Aberdeen,%20WA) [![Twitter Opens in new window](https://aberdeenwa.gov/Assets/Images/IconShareTwitter.png "Share on Twitter")](https://twitter.com/share?url=https%3a%2f%2faberdeenwa.gov%2fAlertCenter.aspx%3fAID%3d99&text=Check%20out%20this%20alert%20for%20Aberdeen,%20WA) [![Email Opens in new window](https://aberdeenwa.gov/Assets/Images/IconShareEmail.png "Share via Email")](https://aberdeenwa.gov/AlertCenter.aspx?AID=City-Council-Meetings-Moved-to-Grays-Har-99#)

REGULAR MEETINGS
----------------

* Begins at 6:30 p.m.
* 2nd, 4th and 5th Wednesday of every month

[**2025 CITY COUNCIL MEETING SCHEDULE**](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/2434)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### [Calendar](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/calendar.aspx?CID=25)

1. #### Wed, Nov. 26

   **[Regular City Council Meeting](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/Calendar.aspx?EID=1125)**
2. #### Wed, Dec. 3

   **[City Council Workshop: Robert's Rules of Order](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/Calendar.aspx?EID=1213)**
3. #### Wed, Dec. 10

   **[Regular City Council Meeting](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/Calendar.aspx?EID=1114)**

[View All Calendar](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/calendar.aspx?CID=25)

/Calendar.aspx

AGENDAS & MINUTES
-----------------

Agendas and supportive documentation are available at City Hall on the Mondays prior to meeting. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/AgendaCenter)

Wards
-----

The City of Aberdeen citizens are represented by six geographically divided wards:

* [Aberdeen Ward Map](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/1526/Aberdeen-Ward-Map-PDF)

1. [Agendas & Minutes](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/AgendaCenter)
2. [Boards & Commissions](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/213/Boards-Commissions)

   1. [Arts Commission](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/253/Arts-Commission)
   2. [City Council](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/275/City-Council)
   3. [Good Neighbors Revolving Loan Fund](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/240/Good-Neighbors-Revolving-Loan-Fund)
   4. [Historic Preservation Commission](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/241/Historic-Preservation-Commission)
   5. [Homeless Response Committee](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/445/Homeless-Response-Committee)
   6. [Lodging Tax Committee](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/292/Lodging-Tax-Committee)
   7. [Planning Commission](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/243/Planning-Commission)
   8. [Museum Board](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/369/Museum-Board)
   9. [Park Board](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/370/Park-Board)
   10. [Library Board](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/419/Library-Board)
3. [City Council](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/275/City-Council)
4. [Council Roster & Committee Assignments (PDF)](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/DocumentCenter/View/2455/2025-Standing-Committees)
5. [Municipal Code](https://aberdeen.municipal.codes/)
6. [Public Records Request](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/291/Public-Records-Request)
7. [Mayor Orr](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/367/Mayor-Orr)
8. [Regional Fire Authority (RFA)](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/421/Regional-Fire-Authority-RFA)

[Maps/GIS](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/225)
